# Professional Photography & Video

Chicago’s premier photography and video production company. Serving the
Chicago area for over 20 years, our creative photographers, videographers and
editors are highly experienced and professional.

Request a Quote

## INTRODUCTION REEL

We believe that incorporating professional photography and video into your
marketing strategy is the best way to build your brand and attract more
customers.

## PHOTOGRAPHY SERVICES

In today’s digital age, you can’t afford to go without creative photo or video
content as part of your marketing strategy. Here are just some of the services
we can provide.

Video production is becoming more popular than ever, and research has shown
that adding video as part of your overall marketing strategy greatly increases
brand awareness and makes your company more captivating to your potential and
current customers.

This goes to show that the demand for video content is rapidly increasing.”

Read More

WHY CHOOSE US “Thank you so much to Jimmy, Gabe, and Mac for providing us
really great service for our event earlier this month. I loved the quality of
photos Gabe took and Jimmy was really helpful with getting us all set prior to
the event. I love the online tool he uses when sending the quote which allows
you to directly send emails and questions prior to signing. I highly recommend
Chicago Corporate Photo & Video!” - Natasha F.  WHY CHOOSE US “I highly
recommend Chicago Corporate Photography & Video! They are a great firm, and
very easy to work with. The team is friendly, collaborative and responsive. We
hired them on to produce 9 short videos, and we were blown away with the final
look and quality. We are absolutely thrilled with the results and will use
them for future projects!” - Blessilda E.  WHY CHOOSE US “Our company needed
nearly 50 headshots in order to update our company website, and Jimmy did a
great job as our photographer! He was organized, easy to work with, flexible
when we had a few makeups, and provided the final headshots in very quick
turnaround. Jimmy gave us great value, and we look forward to working with him
for any of our future headshot needs.” - Sarah B.  WHY CHOOSE US “We chose
Chicago Corporate Photography & Video to shoot a video series of short
lectures at the day-long conference. Jimmy handled the entire process with
professional ease. He had great communication and response times, from initial
contact to final product. On site at the event, Jimmy and his staff were
pleasant, on time, well prepared, and organized. The turnaround time for
production was quick, and the final product looked and sounded great and was
well-appreciated by our client. ” \- Aja M.  WHY CHOOSE US “Working with Jimmy
was a breeze. The process to book, and pay for services was easy and the
turnaround time was exceptional. I went in for a corporate shot, which took
just a few minutes, reviewed the photos and made my selection. Jimmy, offers
unlimited shots to find your best side, and angle. I will recommend Jimmy for
all our corporate needs moving forward.” - Noel M.

“The team at Chicago Corporate Photography and Video are amazing! They were
able to deliver above and beyond in such a short amount of time. I highly
recommend them for any video and photography needs!” -Rae A, Chicago, IL

Why Choose Us

# Best Affordable Photography Company In Chicago

# Best Affordable Photography Company In Chicago

If you are looking for the best affordable photography company in Chicago,
we’ve got you covered. At Chicago Corporate Photography and Video, we tailor
each photo shoot specifically to you and your needs. For over 2 decades, the
best affordable photography company in Chicago, Chicago Corporate Photography
and Video, has been capturing unique moments that tell a story. Let us capture
yours!

## START YOUR PROJECT TODAY

Request a Quote

###  **WHY  ** **SHOULD I WORK WITH CHICAGO’S BEST AFFORDABLE PHOTOGRAPHY
COMPANY?**

One reason to work with our affordable Chicago photography company is because
we have over 15 years in the industry. Therefore, our company knows the ins
and outs of photography. We have gone through years of training and schooling
in the art. So, when you hire Chicago Corporate Photography and Video, you are
not just hiring someone with a fancy camera; you are hiring someone who knows
how to make anyone feel comfortable in front of the camera, who knows the
right angles and lighting and who knows how to make the subject look their
best.

As the best affordable photography company in Chicago, we have years of
experience to draw from. You wouldn’t call yourself a carpenter just because
you have a hammer and tape measure, would you? So, you should not hire a
mediocre “photographer” just because they own an expensive camera.

When you work with Chicago Corporate Photography and Video, you are not just
paying for the actual photos. Rather, you are paying for the photographer’s
time, skills and expertise. Not only do we own state-of-the-art photography
equipment, but we know how to use it advantageously. We know which lenses to
use, which lighting, and even know the right backdrops, poses and angles to
use for each photo.

###  **HOW CAN SUPERIOR PHOTOS TAKEN BY AN AFFORDABLE PHOTOGRAPHER IN CHICAGO
BENEFIT MY BUSINESS?**

Even more, we have yet to meet someone who does not adore getting their
picture taken by a professional photographer. Often, the cost of hiring a
professional photography company might cause you to consider being able to get
by without it. After all, with today’s advent of technology, you could just
take some photos yourself. Right? Wrong.

While you might be thinking that your company’s funds would be better spent on
more important things, think again. In reality, there’s hardly anything more
important than high-quality photography by the best affordable photography
company in Chicago.

 _Why_? No matter what industry you are in, every business can greatly benefit
from professional photos. Professional photography is an essential asset that
will wildly contribute to your business’s overall success.

Your photos are the first thing people see when interacting with your brand.
If you have low quality images, these photos will communicate the same thing
about your business’s products and services. When it comes to making a first
impression, be sure to use substantial photos taken by an affordable Chicago
photographer for your company’s blog or website.

Perhaps even more important, if your company has a website, optimized photos
can help your business rank higher online. This is because images play a large
role in search engine optimization, or SEO. Better, personalized images can
also help encourage customers to remain on your website for longer and can
persuade them to pick you over your competition.

Ultimately, professional photos shot by an affordable Chicago photographer are
fundamental assets to any business. When it comes to online marketing,
everyone knows that content is king. By this, we mean that your website needs
images if you want to see results from your written content or products and
services. Since people are predominantly visual creatures, in today’s photo-
centric world, images of your brand governs consumer perception now more than
ever. With premium quality photos shot by the best affordable photography
company in Chicago, your company will undoubtedly see results.

###  **CHICAGO’S BEST AFFORDABLE PHOTOGRAPHY COMPANY CAN DO IT ALL** ** **

Many people believe they can get by without getting professional portraits.
However, if you plan to be successful in today’s competitive climate, then
professional photos are essential. Whether you plan on highlighting your
company’s achievements or simply want to make a personal portfolio stand out,
the best affordable photography company in Chicago has got you covered.

As high-quality as our iPhone cameras may be nowadays, the photos are nothing
compared to a picture taken by a professional using a high-tech DSLR.

However, many people often do not get to experience this opportunity because
many professional photographers are hired on a one-time basis to capture
large-budgeted, eminent public events, instead of your intimate Saturday night
dinner party with 10 friends. Luckily, at Chicago Corporate Photography and
Video, our affordable Chicago photographer shoots everything from your
family’s holiday celebration to your corporate events and tradeshows.

 _Some of our other photography and videography services include:_

  * Advertising Photography
  * Aerial and Drone Footage
  * Celebrity Portraits
  * Conference Photos
  * Conventions and Trade Show Photography
  * Executive Headshots
  * Healthcare Photography
  * Holiday and Special Event Photography
  * Hotel Photography
  * Law Office Photography
  * Real Estate Photography
  * Product Launch Photos
  * Transportation Photography
  * VIP Meet and Greets
  * Photo Retouching
  * Post Production

###  **PROFESSIONAL PHOTOGRAPHY AT A FRACTION OF THE COST!**

If you are someone who is watching their money (and let’s face it, who
isn’t?), then when it comes time to hire a photographer for your business,
event, family celebration or any occasion for that matter, you might naturally
think about enlisting your family friend or relative who has a passion for
photography. Perhaps they have offered advice or even their own services at a
reduced rate. However, before you pick an amateur before a professional, be
cautious. When it comes to documenting your most precious and valued moments
and preserving these memories, trying to save a small amount of cash just
isn’t constructive. ** **

Our company offers superior quality photography and videography services at an
affordable price. The experts at Chicago Corporate Photography and Video pride
ourselves on supplying outstanding customer service as well as exceptional
photography from our initial meeting to our final delivery of the images and
afterwards. We also offer a free initial consultation for your photo session
either in person at our Chicago studio or over the phone so you are certain to
get the most out of your shoot.

###  **CHICAGO’S BEST AFFORDABLE PHOTOGRAPHY COMPANY**

Shooting quality photography is a skill that’s acquired after years of
practice, experience and training. At Chicago Corporate Photography and Video,
you get professional photographs at a fraction of the cost of other
photography studios. You can find the best affordable photography company in
Chicago conveniently located just north of the downtown Loop. We also are
willing to travel for our affordable photography services throughout the city
and surrounding suburbs, as well as anywhere in the country!

Here at Chicago Corporate Photography and Video, we offer the best affordable
photography services with unique style, creativity and high-end equipment to
make sure we capture images that effectively tell your story. Chicago
Corporate Photography and Video is honored to be the best affordable
photography company in Chicago. If you’re looking for high-resolution
photographs or professional prints to help you stand out from the crowd,
consider Chicago Corporate Photography and Video for all of your photo needs.

If you have any questions regarding our services or about how we are able to
provide guaranteed customer satisfaction at such a low cost, please feel free
to give our studio a call at 312-623-3456 or you may Contact Us Here.
